description: The file defines the HomeFragment class for an Android app, implementing a UI fragment that displays categories of videos in a list with focus management, navigation, and interaction logic. It manages sections like 'Continue Watching' and 'Favorites', handles user input via DPAD keys, and interfaces with data stores and external components to present and interact with video content.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: A Fragment subclass that displays a home screen with video categories, focus management, and navigation tailored for TV remote interactions.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes view components, sets up data collection for favorites, navigation, and focus handling.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Refreshes data and UI when returning to the fragment.

methods.name: refreshRows
methods.description: Builds and displays category rows, restoring focus if specified.

methods.name: resolveFavorites
methods.description: Resolves favorite video IDs to Video objects, maintaining order.

methods.name: getVideosForRow
methods.description: Returns list of videos for a given row index.

methods.name: getSelectedVideo
methods.description: Retrieves the video at specified row and column.

methods.name: isContinueWatchingRow
methods.description: Checks if a given row index corresponds to the 'Continue Watching' category.

methods.name: getRowKey
methods.description: Returns a string key for a category row.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout for the fragment.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up views, data collection, and key event handling after view creation.
